headline.main: URGES DECLARATION OF WAR ON GERMANY; Congress for Freedom Also Asks Repeal of Neutrality Act

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 10 (AP) -- The Continental Congress for Freedom passed a resolution today calling for a declaration of war against Germany and another for repeal of the Neutrality Act, even if it meant war.
abstract: repeal urged by Fight for Freedom Wash group
